---
title: "About"
---

This website presents benchmark results for [anvil](https://github.com/r-xla/anvil), an R package providing an XLA backend.

The benchmarks compare anvil against PyTorch and R torch on standard deep learning workloads to track performance across releases.

Source code: [github.com/r-xla/benchmarks](https://github.com/r-xla/benchmarks)
